reviewText: Shoma at it again and this time it's with Ezaki Hinami a girl how was a student of his when Shoma was an intern teacher at Ezaki's collage. Now Ezaki is a photographer at a local newspaper and decides to confess her feelings for Shoma. but Shoma gets an assignment to America and he most be gone for a year, so how will Ezaki, Chisato, and Kuu feel about the love of their lives being gone for so long.

Short sex scenes that are choppy and focus almost entirely on shots of the lower half of the body. I have no problem with that but the angles weren't that good. I liked the first episodes in this serious but this volume feels like it was put together fast with the scenes being far too short.
